components.label: Total Average
components.calculateValue:
value =
  row.monthlygrossprofit + row.monthlygrossprofitotherthancar
    ? Math.round(
        (row.monthlygrossprofit +
          row.monthlygrossprofitotherthancar +
          Number.EPSILON) *
          100
      ) / 100
    : 0;

components.customConditional: show = row.totalAverageSales > 0;

components.label: Minimum Recommended Business Income Limit

var calculateValue = row.totalAverageSales * (row.coinsuranceamount / 100);
value = calculateValue ? calculateValue : 0;
